title: Endemol buys Tiger Aspect | Endemol | The Guardian
snippet: Endemol, the Dutch company behind Big Brother, has bought independent producers Tiger Aspect, Darlow Smithson and Tigress from IMG, in a deal reportedly worth Â£30m-40m. The deal is expected to make Endemol's UK subsidiary the biggest British ...

title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: In June 2006, Tiger Aspect and Tigress Productions were purchased by IMG Media, an international talent and rights group, but were then sold to Endemol UK in November 2009.

title: Tigress Productions
snippet: Endemol UK today announced that Dick Colthurst has been promoted to Managing Director of its factual indie Tigress Productions. ... Endemol, a world leader in entertainment programming, today announced that it has acquired Tiger Aspect, Darlow Smithson and Tigress from IMG, effective immediately.
